name: Chubby Globby - Pop Stars Team
description:
Welcome to Chubby Globby! 
Here you need to have good timing when pressing the spacebar to eat the right food!
Eat as much as you can before time runs out!

Food Features:
Peppers will stun you for 5 seconds
Jelly will give you 1 point
Sausage will give you 3 points

Controls:
Mouse - Select UI Buttons
SpaceBar - Eat

Team Pop Stars:
Jorge Puertovannetti - Project Manager & Programmer
Ting Ting Shen - Artist and Designer  (https://ting0405.itch.io/)
Hetarth Thakor - UI Programmer  (https://gd04hetarth.itch.io/)
